title: Biologist
summary: A biologist is a scientist who conducts research in biology.[1][2][3] Biologists are interested in studying life on Earth, whether it is an individual cell, a multicellular organism, or a community of interacting populations.[1] They usually specialize in a particular branch (e.g., molecular biology, zoology, and evolutionary biology) of biology[4] and have a specific research focus (e.g., studying malaria or cancer).[5]
